alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; McIntosh; Muskogee; Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:39AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pushmataha, western Haskell, McIntosh, western Latimer, Pittsburg and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 639 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Lake Eufaula State Park to 3 miles south of Indianola to 3 miles north of Wardville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and dime to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Wilburton... Eufaula... Stigler... Hartshorne... Krebs... Quinton... Kiowa... Porum... Savanna... Crowder... Whitefield... Alderson... Kinta... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Ashland... Stidham... Higgins... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 245 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Haskell; Latimer; McIntosh; Muskogee; Pittsburg; Pushmataha
